snippet: First-quarter results offered little sign that it was pulling out of an extended slump, as the retailer warned that second-quarter sales at its once-trendy yoga wear shops were off to a weak start.
abstract: Lululemon Athletica reports first-quarter net profit of $19 million, or 13 cents a share, down from $47.3 million or 32 cents per share one year earlier; cuts financial forecast for second quarter, offering little sign that it is pulling out of an extended slump.
lead_paragraph: First-quarter results offered little sign that it was pulling out of an extended slump, as the retailer warned that second-quarter sales at its once-trendy yoga wear shops were off to a weak start.

headline.main: Lululemon Athletica Revises Its Annual Forecast Downward
headline.print_headline: Lululemon Athletica Revises Its Annual Forecast Downward
